Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-9681 affecting package cmake for versions less than 3.21.4-16
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-9681 affecting package cmake for versions less than 3.21.4-16. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package cmake is earlier than 3.21.4-16, affected by CVE-2024-9681
